ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 96
ygData.msgSnippet: You are right, but I was really just directing the message mainly at those two. Maybe I should have directly sent it to them instead.
ygData.messageBody:
You are right, but I was really just directing the message mainly at those
two. Maybe I should have directly sent it to them instead.


>From: AOLTechDaZ@...
>Reply-To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 96
>Date: Tue, 5 Oct 1999 10:38:22 EDT
>
>In a message dated 99-10-03 17:32:36 EDT, you write:
>
><< Why do you all act like this? I try to help, but you decline it. If what
>you
> want is for me to truly leave with my information, then that is what I
>will
> do. I will leave the choice up to you. I'm trying to apologize by
>helping,
> but you seem to want to be stubborn, and keep insulting me, saying all
>I'm
> out here to do is brag, when in fact I'm trying to do the opposite. What
>I
> have to do could easily be done by a level 1 shaman barbarian. I just
>want
> to check it out for myself first and return with a report, if you all
>hate
> me so much that you wouldn't even take direct information from me because
> you think I want to just brag about it, then I wil quietly leave you all
> with out another letter. But like I said, it's yur choice, you can accept
>it
> or decline it. >>
>
>
>On your part I don't think its right your judging the whole message board
>by
>the posts of 2 people.
><< text3.html >>
